trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_SEQ_00<tab>Houu has a nose for noxious happenings in the spawning grounds─especially where the Coral Tridents are involved.
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_SEQ_01<tab>Maelstrom recruits have been captured by the Coral Tridents, and rendered helpless by noxious gas from paralysis pots. Houu has given you stoppers to use on the pots.
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_SEQ_02<tab>The stoppers proved to be a perfect fit, and the reeling recruits are back on their feet and out of the Sapsa Spawning Grounds. Report the successful mission to Houu.

TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_SEQ_03<tab>A Sahagin of peace, Houu reveals that he is caught between two faiths. He would not deny Leviathan his rightful oblations, but would not have a war fought over the “drowning” of shorewalkers, either. It is unfortunate that your two peoples will yet be caught up in this struggle for the foreseeable future...
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_TODO_00<tab>Use pot stoppers on paralysis pots in the Sapsa Spawning Grounds.
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_TODO_01<tab>Report to Houu.
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_HOUU_000_000<tab>Pshhh... The waves bring news of shhhorewalkers held captive by the Coral Tridents. They are of the Maelstrom─mere recruits.

TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_HOUU_000_001<tab>They are certain to be “drowned”─their minds twisted by Leviathan's aweshhhome powers. Unleshhh something is done, the Maelstrom may feel it necessary to shhhtrike back. Go to their rescue, shhhorewalker.

TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_HOUU_000_002<tab>Deep within the shhhpawning grounds, you will find them lying insensate. The gas shhhpewing forth from the Tridents' paralysis pots comes from noxious barnacles, and it renders them helpleshhh.
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_HOUU_000_003<tab>Pshhh... Use these shhhtoppers to plug the pots stationed by the recruits. They should come to shhhortly thereafter once the air clears.
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_HOUU_000_004<tab>Use the shhhtoppers on the paralysis pots to restore the captive shhhorewalkers to their shhhenses. But beware the Coral Tridents along the way... Pshhh...
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_KOKKA01397_000_005<tab>Row, row, row your boat...
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_KOKKA01397_000_006<tab>Fishies... Here, fishies...
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_KOKKA01397_000_007<tab>Mother...?
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_KOKKA01397_000_008<tab>Llymlaen... Halone... Thaliak... I...I can't remember which god to call to...
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_KOKKA01397_000_010<tab>Ungh... I'm not... What's...? What in the Navigator's name am I doing? We have to get out of here!
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_KOKKA01397_000_011<tab>Wh-Where am I!? What is this!? We were attacked! Taken by the Sahagin! Must! Report!
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_KOKKA01397_000_012<tab>What a dream! Home, before the Calamity. Had it pretty good, didn't I? But my home's with the Maelstrom now... I'd better get back.
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_KOKKA01397_000_013<tab>Adventurer, you have saved my sanity! Those cursed fishbacks would part me from mine own mind!
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_POPMESSAGE_000_020<tab>You sense a hostile presence!
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_HOUU_000_030<tab>The captive shhhorewalkers swim free? Good... The drowned have their place, for Lord Leviathan must have His due, but...

TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_HOUU_000_031<tab>Shhhorewalkers are a vengeful people. For every Maelstrom won for Lord Leviathan, there will be retribution in kind and more. Not worth the trouble, I shhhould think. Pshhh...
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_SAHUAGIN01397_000_040<tab>(-Shelfclaw Guard-)Pshhh! You dare take what belongs to Lord Leviathan!?
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_SAHUAGIN01397_000_041<tab>(-Shelfclaw Guard-)Another shhhoul that shhheeks to be drowned! Your innermost wish I shhhall grant!
TEXT_BANSAH208_01397_SAHUAGIN01397_000_042<tab>(-Shelfclaw Guard-)The Coral Tridents take no prisoners! Well, except this lot. But never you mind that─prepare to die!
